REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2641 reute r f BC-GEODYNE-<GEOD>-TO-OFF 03-23 0077

TEXT.TITLE: GEODYNE <GEOD> TO OFFER PARTNERSHIP UNITS
TEXT.BODY: Geodyne Resources Inc said it will begin selling immediately 300 mln dlrs worth of limited partnership interests in PaineWebber/Geodyne Energy Income Program II. The company said a unit will serve as general partner of the partnership, which will acquire oil and gas producing properties from third parties. PaineWebber <PWJ> will serve as the dealer-manager for the offering, it said. Reuter
